high_descs: Walk few step straight, before passing the end of the bed turn to your left
Pick up the ball on the floor
Walk few step towards the table
anns.task_desc: Examine the ball by the light of the lamp

high_descs: Walk to the basketball on the floor by the bed.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Face the lamp on the dresser in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk to the desk.
Take the basketball on the floor between the desk and the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the right corner of the desk.
anns.task_desc: To view the basketball in the lamp light.
